  <a href="http://br.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/ase_1920x1080.jpg?itok=5WVl9j0K" rel="shared-gallery" class="lightbox cboxElement"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_medium/public/upload/ase_1920x1080.jpg?itok=gwUXMESW" width="640" height="360" alt="" /></a>
</div>
</div></div></div></div></div><h1 class="article-title">Você é Fogo ou Gelo?</h1><div class="field field-name-custom-author field-type-entityreference field-label-hidden"><span class="article_detail"><span class="posted_by">Por: Nightingale</span></span></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><p>O caos está chegando. Quem vai ganhar seu apoio?</p>

<p>Não perca a batalha elemental entre a Equipe Fogo e a Equipe Gelo durante o Evento All-Star 2016. Confira o que vem por aí:</p> <br /><h3>
<strong>Novidades</strong>
</h3>

<p>
<span class="content-border"> <a href="https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/december/ayfoi/ASE_StoreBanners_IconWard_640x200.jpg" class="lightbox cboxElement" rel="gallery"> <img src="https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/december/ayfoi/ASE_StoreBanners_IconWard_640x200.jpg&amp;resize=640:" /></a> </span></p>

<p><strong>Ícones Equipe Fogo e Equipe Gelo [de 6 a 15 de dezembro]:</strong> Você é um fogo ardente, pronto para fazer churrasquinho dos seus oponentes ou seu estilo é mais frio, gelando todo o calor que seus inimigos emanam? Você também vai receber uma animação e volta à base temáticas, bem como um plano de fundo para o cliente atualizado baseado nas suas escolhas de fogo ou gelo até o dia <strong>15 de dezembro, às 05:59 (horário de verão de Brasília)</strong>. Mostre sua lealdade à Equipe Gelo ou Equipe Fogo por <strong>250 RP</strong>. </p>

<div class="gs-container default-2-col">
	<div>
		<span class="content-border"> <a href="https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/december/ayfoi/SantaBraumASFire.gif%3Fv%3D06072015" class="lightbox cboxElement" rel="gallery"> <img src="https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/december/ayfoi/SantaBraumASFire.gif%3Fv%3D06072015" /></a> </span>
		</div>
	<div>
		<span class="content-border"> <a href="https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/december/ayfoi/SnowDayGravesASIce.gif" class="lightbox cboxElement" rel="gallery"> <img src="https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/december/ayfoi/SnowDayGravesASIce.gif" /></a> </span>
		</div>
</div>


<p><strong>Ícone Evento All-Star [de 6 a 15 de dezembro]:</strong> Celebre o Evento All-Star 2016 com o novo ícone EAS por <strong>1 IP</strong>, ou receba-o gratuitamente caso tenha votado nos seus profissionais favoritos. </p>

<p><strong>Sentinela Evento All-Star 2016 [de 8 a 14 de dezembro]:</strong> Com o início do evento, habilite a sentinela que combina os elementos da Equipe Fogo e Equipe Gelo por <strong>640 RP</strong>.</p> <br /><h3>
<strong>Ativação dos Presentes Misteriosos</strong>
</h3>

<p>
<span class="content-border"> <a href="https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/december/ayfoi/ASE_StoreBanners_Mystery_640x200.jpg" class="lightbox cboxElement" rel="gallery"> <img src="https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/december/ayfoi/ASE_StoreBanners_Mystery_640x200.jpg&amp;resize=640:" /></a> </span></p>

<p>Assista atentamente o EAS e preste atenção em quaisquer Pentakills ou roubos de Barão que podem acontecer durante as partidas, pois eles ativarão bônus em Presentes Misteriosos. Esta ativação pode conceder até 4x a chance de recebimento de skins lendárias e de eSports! Só para o All-Star, vamos adicionar uma ativação: caso um 1x1 acabe antes que as tropas se encontrem na rota, também vamos aumentar as chances.</p> <br /><h3>
<strong>Pacotes</strong>
</h3>

<p>Habilite uma composição elemental, recheada com algumas de nossas skins mais quentes e de alguns amigos gelados com nosso mega disconto. Todos os pacotes estão disponíveis <strong>de 6 a 14 de dezembro</strong>:</p>

<p></p><h4><strong>Mega Pacote Equipe Fogo - 50% de desconto</strong> por 7570 RP <span style="font-size:.8em">(13164 RP caso precise dos Campeões)</span></h4>

<p>
<span class="content-border"> <a href="https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/december/ayfoi/ASE_StoreBanners_TeamFire_640x200.jpg%3Fv%3D06072015" class="lightbox cboxElement" rel="gallery"> <img src="https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/december/ayfoi/ASE_StoreBanners_TeamFire_640x200.jpg%3Fv%3D06072015&amp;resize=640:" /></a> </span></p>

<div class="gs-container default-2-col">
<div>
<p><strong>Skins inclusas:</strong> </p><ul><li>Ahri Raposa Flamejante</li>
	<li>Alistar Infernal</li>
	<li>Diana Infernal</li>
	<li>Kindred Fogo Sombrio</li>
	<li>Malphite de Obsidiana</li>

	<li>Jinx Fogos de Artifício</li>
</ul></div>
<div>

</ul></div>
</div>

<p></p><h4><strong>Mega Pacote Equipe Gelo – 50% de desconto</strong>, por 6345 RP <span style="font-size:.8em">(10724 RP caso precise dos Campeões)</span></h4>

<p>
<span class="content-border"> <a href="https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/december/ayfoi/ASE_StoreBanners_TeamIce_640x200.jpg%3Fv%3D06072015" class="lightbox cboxElement" rel="gallery"> <img src="https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/december/ayfoi/ASE_StoreBanners_TeamIce_640x200.jpg%3Fv%3D06072015&amp;resize=640:" /></a> </span></p>

<div class="gs-container default-2-col">
<div>
<p><strong>Skins inclusas:</strong> </p><ul><li>Ezreal Gélido</li>
	<li>Ashe de Freljord</li>
	<li>Irelia das Lâminas Gélidas</li>
	<li>Janna Rainha Gélida</li>
	<li>Annie do Raio de Gelo</li>

<div>

    <h1 class="c-heading">
        Level up @ Riot
    </h1>

    <hr class="c-rule">

    <p class="u-text-center">
        We’re helping players connect their passions to careers in gaming. Disciplines range from Game Design to Finance, Data Science to Art, Engineering to Brand Management and all that’s inbetween. Our university programs include internships for undergraduates and graduates, talks we give on campuses around the globe, graduate research projects we conduct in the winter, and classroom takeovers.
    </p>

    <div class="o-spacer"></div>

    <section class="o-section-bg">
        <h2 class="c-heading c-heading--left c-heading--light">Work Hard, Play Hard</h2>
        <p>
            That’s how many interns describe their time at Riot, and we think that’s pretty accurate. Interns roost in most Riot offices around the world, from LAX to Berlin, where they tackle tough problems while getting to know each other over rounds of League. We believe interns deserve the full-time Rioter treatment-- the opportunity to take on meaningful problems impacting over 70 million players rather than fetching coffee.
        </p>

        <div class="o-spacer"></div>

        <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/internship-info" class="c-button">Internship Information

<div class="o-container o-container--full clearfix">

    <div class="o-grid o-grid--flex">

        <div class="o-grid__column o-grid__column--6-md">
            <div class="o-section-bg o-section-bg--compact o-section-bg--alt-1">
                <h2 class="c-heading c-heading--light c-heading--spacer">Graduate Winter Project</h2>
                <hr class="c-rule">
                <p class="u-text-center">Our Graduate Winter Project invites a select number of graduate students to a Riot office to gain experience developing their business and analytical skills. It's a glimpse into the working life at Riot, so top students know what they'd be signing up for.</p>
                <p class="u-text-center">Each student team takes on the subject of a specific case study: challenging situations digging into key business decisions we face as a growing company. The small five- or six-person team learns our strategies and how we've applied them to similar problems. The objective and deliverables are set by Rioters who identify unique problem spaces for students to explore.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="o-grid__column o-grid__column--6-md">
            <div class="o-section-bg o-section-bg--compact o-section-bg--alt-2 u-text-center">
                <div class="o-section-bg__logo c-logo c-logo--ulol">
                    uLoL
                </div>
                <p><strong>More than just a game.</strong></p>
                <p class="u-text-center">University League of Legends (ULoL) is a student-led network of League of Legends players on college campuses across the U.S. and Canada. Whether you’re new to League or a seasoned Rift vet, ULoL is your place to connect with other League players, learn how and why they play, and see what they're up to when afk.</p>
